DOC.brief_summary: This study aim examine effect 25 hydroxyvitamin D supplementation structure exercise program exercise capacity quality life haemodialysis patient 25 hydroxyvitamin D insufficiency .
DOC.brief_title: Effect 25-hydroxyvitamin D Structured Exercise Program Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Stable dialysis least 3 month 2 . Able obtain informed consent 3 . Medically stable 4 . Dialysis adequacy target small solute clearance ( ie Kt/V > 1.2 Urea reduction ratio > 65 % ) 5 . Serum 25hydroxyvitamin D level less 75nmol/L baseline 1 . Limb Amputation 2 . Impaired cognition 3 . Impaired vision 4 . Haemoglobin concentration < 110g/L 5 . Change Erythropoiesis stimulate agent dose last 2 month 6 . Unable unwilling comply exercise program
